summary: Update YOLO model for edge device deployment
description: Ensure that the YOLOv7 model used for safety analysis can run on Nvidia Jetson devices. Optimize the model for latency and accuracy trade-offs.

comments.comment: We should also test it on the Nano platform to confirm performance.
Good point. Adding it to the task checklist.

summary: Improve face recognition robustness in low-light conditions
description: Investigate failure cases in airport face recognition. Analyze low-light datasets and consider augmenting data with synthetic images.

comments.comment: Make sure to look into using GANs for generating low-light samples.

summary: Validate person detection accuracy in adverse weather
description: Test the accuracy of the person detection module for autonomous vehicles during rain and snow conditions. Use the new dataset collected from the test track.

comments.comment: Do we have the performance metrics for similar conditions in the past?
Adding a comparison with previous datasets to the scope.

summary: Evaluate Transformer model for deepfake detection
description: Run experiments using Vision Transformers (ViTs) for deepfake detection. Compare against current CNN baseline.

comments.comment: Initial results show a 2% improvement in recall. Sharing the notebook in the review thread.
Metrics look promising. Letâ€™s proceed with formal evaluation.

summary: Generate heatmaps for store entry/exit patterns
description: Visualize customer movement patterns at retail store entrances using OpenCV. Heatmaps should capture high-traffic areas.

comments.comment: Ensure privacy by anonymizing all customer footage.
